alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 03 at 2:44PM EST until March 03 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 61 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST NORTH CAROLINA CHEROKEE IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE ANDERSON BLOUNT BRADLEY CAMPBELL HAMILTON KNOX LOUDON MCMINN MEIGS MONROE MORGAN POLK RHEA ROANE SCOTT UNION THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCOA, ANDREWS, ARCHVILLE, ATHENS, BEARDEN, BENTON, BIG SOUTH FORK NATIONAL, BIG SPRING, BRADBURY, BULLET CREEK, CARYVILLE, CHATTANOOGA, CLEAR WATER, CLEVELAND, CLINTON, CONASAUGA, DAYTON, DENTVILLE, EAGLE FURNACE, ELGIN, ELK VALLEY, ETOWAH, EVENSVILLE, FAIRVIEW, FINCASTLE, GRANDVIEW, HAPPY VALLEY, HARRIMAN, HIAWASSE DAM, HIGH POINT, HUNTSVILLE, JELLICO, KINGSTON, KNOXVILLE, LA FOLLETTE, LAKE FOREST, LENOIR CITY, LOUDON, LUTTRELL, MADISONVILLE, MARBLE, MARYVILLE, MAYNARDVILLE, MURPHY, NORMA, NORRIS LAKE, OAK RIDGE, OLD WASHINGTON, OLIVER SPRINGS, ONEIDA, PARKSVILLE, PAULETTE, PETROS, PINE ORCHARD, RELIANCE, ROCKWOOD, ROSE HILL, ROYAL BLUE, SHARPS CHAPEL, SLICK ROCK, SMOKEY JUNCTION, SPRING CITY, SWEETWATER, TASSO, TOPTON, UNAKA, VIOLET, AND WHITE OAK.
